```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(flextable)
library(janitor)
library(scales)
```

```{r}
schools <- read_csv("EducationDataPortal_10.04.2019_schools.csv")
```

# California

Here are the top 10 schools by enrollment in California.

```{r}
top_schools <- function(state_to_filter) {
  schools %>% 
    filter(state_name == state_to_filter) %>% 
    top_n(10, enrollment) %>% 
    arrange(desc(enrollment)) %>% 
    mutate(enrollment = comma(enrollment)) %>% 
    select(-state_name) %>% 
    set_names(c("School", "Enrollment")) %>% 
    flextable() %>% 
    align(align = "left", j = 1, part = "all") %>% 
    width(width = 3.0)
}

top_schools("California")

```


# Oregon

Here are the top 10 schools by enrollment in Oregon.

```{r}
top_schools("Oregon")
```

# Washington

Here are the top 10 schools by enrollment in Washington.

top_schools("Washington")
